org.gvsig.raster.cache.buffer

Interface StatsValues

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Band

    public interface StatsValues
    Interface implemented by a raster band with statistics capabilities.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getMax()
      Get the maximun value
      double getMaxRGB()
      Get the maximun value in a eight bits band.

      • getMaxRGB

        double getMaxRGB()
        Get the maximun value in a eight bits band. A value of eight bits has a range betwen -127 and 128. The maximun is readed in a range betwen 0 and 255.
        Returns:

      • setMaxRGB

        void setMaxRGB(double maxRGB)
        Set the maximun value in a eight bits band. A value of eight bits has a range betwen -127 and 128. The maximun is writed in a range betwen 0 and 255.

      • getMinRGB
